sourcesContent: import React from 'react' import { useState } from 'react' const FormHandling = () => { const [Form, setForm] = useState({ FirstName: '', LastName: '', email: '', comment: '', IsFriendly: false }) console.log(Form); const HandleChange = (e) => { const { name, value, type, checked } = e.target; setForm({ ...Form, [name]: type === "checkbox" ? checked : value }) } return (
